DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate effect Facebook-delivered weight-gain prevention program versus Facebook-delivered program general woman 's health information .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Weight Gain African American Reproductive-Aged Women
DOC.detailed_description: Weight gain important health concern , disparity prevalence obesity African American White woman increase throughout reproductive period . This study randomize , control trial test feasibility acceptability peer-coach-administered , Facebook-delivered intervention prevent weight gain overweight obese African American woman . Study visit last approximately 1 hour occur baseline , post-intervention , 1-month follow-up , assess effectiveness acceptability . The core intervention occur 4-week period . Educational content weight-gain prevention program woman 's health program deliver via Facebook , new content post weekday related week 's topic . The peer coach may contact participant via private messaging , need , provide support encourage engagement . If successful , intervention could easily disseminate population under-served community setting .
DOC.criteria: African American Has Facebook account us , average , least day Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2545 Has access internet Able consent English Currently pregnant breastfeeding , recently postpartum ( within 6 week ) Diagnosis Diabetes Mellitus History contraindicate medical condition condition affect weight Current use certain medication
